NK080(wu)013:1: dad dang ldan pa gzhug pa yang //
NK080(wu)013:2: mchod pa bshams la brda phyag bya //
NK080(wu)013:3: dri dang mna' dang mtshams bshags dbab //
NK080(wu)013:4: mchod pa brlabs te zhi khro mchod //
NK080(wu)013:5: mnan dang bsgrag gzhug zhu ba dang //
NK080(wu)013:6: yon dbul bgegs bskrad phyag 'tshal gzhug /tshe sbal la bgegs bskrad sgrib pa bral //
NK080(wu)013:7: bu brlab bdag sgom zhu ba dang //
NK080(wu)013:8: dor dang mig dbye lha dbog dang //
NK080(wu)013:9: dam chu blud cing bsgrags pa dang //
NK080(wu)013:10: sku gsung thugs kyi dam bsgrags pa //
NK080(wu)013:11: bsre dang brtan bya ming dbang bskur //
NK080(wu)013:12: nub dbang bskur zhing lha bshad dang //
NK080(wu)013:13: bka' srung ba dang sum cu gnyis //
NK080(wu)013:14: bsre ba'i cho ga'i tho byang yin //
